data.title: A FRIEND OF TUVALU
data.meta_description: Tuvalu became the 189th member of the United Nations on September 5, 2000. The Prime Minister at the time of entry was the Hon. Ionatana Ionatana, who died in office shortly after, on December 8, 2000. Tuvaluan flag at the UN Late Hon. Ionatana Ionatana Ambassador and Permanent Representative of Tuvalu to the United Nations:…
